Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Reduces the salary of members of the state legislature and provides that the regular legislative session shall end by March 31 annually
Summary: Reduces the salary of members of the state legislature; provides that the regular legislative session shall end by March 31 annually.
LawCode: Amd ยง5, add Art 1-B ยง1-aa, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to reducing the salary of members of the state legislature and providing that the regular legislative session shall end by March 31 annually
